*****

On account of the end of my service in the KBL Services Ltd, I confirm the following:

1) My last working day in KBL Services Ltd is {{doc.last_working_date}}

2) I have surrendered my Company Identity card to {{doc.id_card_submitted_to}}

3) I agree that there are no dues from either party.

4) I will maintain strict secrecy concerning all transactions of the company and Parent Company, as well as with its customers and matters related thereto, which were available/made known to me during my tenure with KBL Services Ltd.


Yours faithfully,
